headline: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish on Iron Mountain Stock?
summary: Although Iron Mountain has trailed the broader market over the past year, Wall Street analysts continue to hold a highly bullish outlook on the stock’s prospects.

raw.headline: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish on Iron Mountain Stock?

headline: How Iron Mountain's (IRM) Revenue Guidance Hike and Data Center Focus Could Reshape Its Investment Story
summary: Iron Mountain recently raised its full-year 2025 revenue guidance to a range of US$6.79 billion to US$6.94 billion, following the release of its second quarter financial results showing higher sales and revenue but reporting a net loss for the period. An important development is growing institutional investor interest, supported by acquisitions at attractive valuations and a sustained focus on the company’s fast-expanding data center segment. We’ll look at how Iron Mountain’s increased...
